major_name: 土木与环境工程理学硕士
ename: MS in Civil and Environmental Engineering
introduction:

requirements: 1、每年只能申请1个专业,但是可以申请一个部门项目,和一个profession school的项目You may apply concurrently to one departmental program and to a professional school program (law, medicine (M.D. program) or business)2、英本需要honor,澳本四年或honor
